title: Michael Lewis | A Closer Look: Trump Travels to Asia as Russia Probe Escalates
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how Trump can’t seem to escape the escalating Russia investigation, even when he is abroad in Asia.

Then, Michael Lewis explains the breadth of responsibilities the USDA has, such as policing disputes between animals and people, and why it really matters who Trump appoints to run it.

Late Night producer Henry Melcher then asks Lewis a few more questions backstage.
